meta.job_title: Python or Groovy Developer with DevOps Experience

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop CI/CD automation solutions for multiple technologies with a specific focus on Kubernetes technologies.
Onboard application technologies such as Python, Node.js, Data Science, and Salesforce into the DevOps automation platform.
Develop libraries, modules, and microservices using Python, Go, or Groovy for CI/CD automation areas.

Integrate DevTestSecOps tooling and experience in various DevOps tooling including Jenkins, GitLab, GitHub, Fortify, Checkmarx, SonarQube, Artifactory, Spinnaker, Argo CD, Flux CD, Rancher, Ansible, Terraform, and SonarQube.
Develop Jenkins Shared Libraries and modules.
Automate Release Management processing using release tools like Digital.ai, Plutora, and Cloudbees CD.
